article_title: Doctor Shortage Worsens, Particularly In Southern States

article_metadata.description: There are 91 active primary care physicians per 100,000 population in the United States, but there needs to be more if Americans are going to get the right care, in the right place and at the right time, a group representing the nation’s medical schools and teaching hospitals says in [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
